name: buldy
description: Modern CSS framework distilled from the best of larger frameworks

scripts.css:compile: sass --no-source-map scss/buldy.scss dist/buldy.css && sass --no-source-map scss/layout/raster.scss dist/raster.css
scripts.css:minify: cleancss --output dist/buldy.min.css dist/buldy.css && cleancss --output dist/raster.min.css dist/raster.css
scripts.build: npm run css:compile && npm run css:minify

author: Johann Schopplich <pkg@johannschopplich.com> (https://johannschopplich.com)
